comment.author: 27541657@N07
comment._content: The rectangle marked original site of La Bahia is still very much identifiable by the layout of the local roads and cemetery.  The small square in the middle of La Bahia is the old fort.  It was here that in 1836 Col. Fannin and his 300 men were imprisoned and later shot and killed.  They are buried in a mass grave nearby.
